864150.name: Feelin
864150.description:
Feelin is one open world with shared constructions for all players.

Make your own avatar. Become a Feelin resident, own land, collect items, build and develop this world together.

Land ownership


  • Land coins can be used to purchase land.
  • The location of the land you own is also important.
  • Land in the center of the world, where there is more traffic, will increase in value in the future.
  • The value of the land will also depend on the value of the surrounding area.
  • Land can be open (available for purchase), purchased, reserved, public, etc.
  • Land can also be sold to earn Land coins.
  • Land has an address/x,y and the name of the owner.

Collecting


  • Let's go collect items in the world.
  • You can collect wood, stone, glass windows, awning roofs, drinks, and various other items.
  • You can collect items from open land parcels. You cannot collect from land that has already been purchased.

Building


  • The freedom of building is great: compared to sandboxes such as 1-meter voxels, you can build in 10-cm intervals, allowing you to build in detail.
  • A single plot of land can hold up to 3,000 items.

Explore


  • Buildings are being constructed little by little by the people who live in Feelin.
  • Some of them are magnificent.
  • Find your favorite area.


Everything is saved on the cloud, the world is infinite in size like the web.
And a long term game that will be in operation long time.


Let's look forward to the coming day of the founding of our nation in Feelin.

Build as much as you can.

Thank you for your constructions and contributions.
864150.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 日语, 法语
